```{r}

source('./R_functions.r')

# Make an empty data frame to store the results
DF <- data.frame(Pop=rep(NA, 14), Ne_est=rep(NA, 14))

# Calculate 
Pops = c("Amboseli", "Mkomazi_E", "Burigi", "Ikiri-Rungwa", "Aruba_Dam", "Ugalla", "Masai_Mara",	"Nairobi",	"Samburu",	"Tsavo",	"Sibiloi",	"Monduli", "Maswa","Mkomazi_W")

for (index in 1:14){
    POP = Pops[index]
    res = get_Ne(base_path = paste("../grants_package/location_prune", POP, sep = ''))
    DF[index, ] = c(POP, res$Ne_est)
}

# take a look at the results 
DF
```
